data.subject: Don`t Give Up (Feat. Natalie Gioia)
data.lyric:
Don't be afraid
 Just take my hand
 Try it over
 And over again
 Even if your dream is broken
 Don't

data.subject: Forever And A Day (Feat. Stine Grove)
data.lyric:
I'll show you I love you
 I'll show you I care
 I'll tell you everything 
 you want and need to hear
